commenter_a: The first real scientific post-debate poll results are out and they are great news for Hillary Clinton. According to the just released Huffington Post/YouGov poll, 55% say Clinton won the debate as compared to just 22% who said Sanders did. Furthermore, 52% in the national poll now say they want Clinton to be the nominee, up from 44% prior to the debate. All in all, a great result that matches the media's assessment of who won the debate, our next President, Hillary Clinton!
